Name: Combined Behavioral Data
Description: Combined behavioral results for all participants and sessions included in dataset ds005598. The data were compiled from individual MATLAB (.mat) behavioral files into a single CSV file for convenience.

sub.Description: Numeric subject identifier matching the BIDS subject label.

sub_name.Description: Full subject label (e.g., sub-01) corresponding to the participant in the BIDS dataset.

blockNo.Description: Block number within the experimental session.

trialNo.Description: Trial number within the current block.

cursorRotation.Description: Rotation angle (in degrees) applied to the visual cursor during the trial.

hand.Description: Hand used during the trial (e.g., left or right).

feedbackMessage.Description: Feedback displayed to the participant after the trial (e.g., 'hit', 'miss', or performance feedback).

hitAngle_hand_good.Description: Actual movement endpoint angle (in degrees) of the participant’s hand during successful trials.

reportedAngle_good.Description: Participant’s reported perceived angle for correctly executed movements.

Acknowledgements: Behavioral data compiled and organized by Ali Rezaei (2025).
